statements: SELECT * FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE area_id = 1;
SELECT area_name, traffic_volume FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT advertising_spend AS spend FROM high_traffic_areas ORDER BY spend DESC;
SELECT area_id, area_name FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE advertising_spend BETWEEN 100 AND 500;
SELECT * FROM high_traffic_areas ORDER BY area_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE area_name LIKE 'D%' ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT area_id, area_name, traffic_volume FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE advertising_spend > 1000 ORDER BY area_name ASC
SELECT area_name, advertising_spend FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE traffic_volume BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY advertising_spend DESC
SELECT area_id, traffic_volume FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE area_name IN ('Park', 'Mall') AND advertising_spend < 5000
SELECT * FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE (traffic_volume > 1000 OR advertising_spend > 2000) AND area_name NOT LIKE '%Plaza%' ORDER BY area_id DESC LIMIT 2
SELECT * FROM advertising_placements;
SELECT placement_id, location_id FROM advertising_placements ORDER BY advertiser_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_placements WHERE traffic_volume > 1000;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 40;
SELECT location_id, location_name, city, state FROM location_data ORDER BY city, state DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_placements WHERE traffic_volume > 100 ORDER BY traffic_volume DESC
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM location_data WHERE latitude >= -90 AND longitude <= 90
SELECT placement_id, traffic_volume FROM advertising_placements WHERE advertiser_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT * FROM advertising_placements INNER JOIN location_data ON advertising_placements.location_id = location_data.location_id WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT location_id, SUM(traffic_volume) AS total_traffic FROM advertising_placements GROUP BY location_id HAVING total_traffic > 500
SELECT * FROM high_traffic_areas;
SELECT area_name, area_population FROM high_traffic_areas;
SELECT placement_id, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_placements;
SELECT location, dimensions, price FROM billboards;
SELECT area_name, area_population, traffic_volume FROM high_traffic_areas;
SELECT * FROM high_traffic_areas ORDER BY area_population DESC;
SELECT area_name, area_population FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE traffic_volume > 5000;
SELECT t.area_name, b.location FROM high_traffic_areas t JOIN billboards b ON t.area_id = b.area_id;
SELECT area_name, SUM(cost_per_day) AS total_cost FROM high_traffic_areas h JOIN advertising_placements a ON h.area_id = a.area_id GROUP BY area_name;
SELECT * FROM advertising_placements WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2023-01-01' AND '2023-06-30' ORDER BY cost_per_day DESC;
SELECT * FROM high_traffic_areas;
SELECT area_name, traffic_level FROM high_traffic_areas ORDER BY traffic_level DESC;
SELECT area_name, traffic_level FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE traffic_level > 50;
SELECT advertiser_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertisers JOIN advertising_placements ON advertisers.advertiser_id = advertising_placements.advertiser_id;
SELECT area_name, traffic_count FROM high_traffic_areas JOIN traffic_data ON high_traffic_areas.area_id = traffic_data.area_id WHERE traffic_count > 1000;
SELECT area_name, traffic_level FROM high_traffic_areas WHERE traffic_level > 5 ORDER BY traffic_level DESC;
SELECT * FROM advertising_placements WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2021-12-01';

SELECT advertiser_name, COUNT(placement_id) AS num_placements FROM advertisers JOIN advertising_placements ON advertisers.advertiser_id = advertising_placements.advertiser_id GROUP BY advertiser_name HAVING num_placements > 2;
SELECT area_id, area_name, traffic_count FROM high_traffic_areas JOIN traffic_data ON high_traffic_areas.area_id = traffic_data.area_id WHERE date = '2021-11-30';

SELECT area_name, SUM(traffic_count) AS total_traffic FROM high_traffic_areas JOIN traffic_data ON high_traffic_areas.area_id = traffic_data.area_id GROUP BY area_name HAVING total_traffic > 1000 ORDER BY total_traffic DESC;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_id, advertiser_name FROM Advertisers WHERE contact_name IS NOT NULL;
SELECT space_location, price FROM AdvertisingSpaces ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, start_date, end_date, budget FROM AdCampaigns WHERE budget > 5000;
SELECT impression_id, impression_date, impression_count FROM AdImpressions WHERE impression_count > 100 ORDER BY impression_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Advertisers;
SELECT advertiser_name, contact_name FROM Advertisers ORDER BY advertiser_name DESC;
SELECT AdCampaigns.campaign_id, AdCampaigns.advertiser_id, Advertisers.advertiser_name FROM AdCampaigns JOIN Advertisers ON AdCampaigns.advertiser_id = Advertisers.advertiser_id;
SELECT space_location, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM AdvertisingSpaces GROUP BY space_location HAVING AVG(price) > 1000;

SELECT AdImpressions.impression_id, AdImpressions.campaign_id, AdClicks.click_date FROM AdImpressions JOIN AdClicks ON AdImpressions.impression_id = AdClicks.impression_id ORDER BY AdClicks.click_date DESC;
